title: Zoning change for St. Louis College of Pharmacy

abstracts.abstract: BOARD BILL NO.  108  INTRODUCED BY ALDERMAN JOSEPH D. RODDY    		An Ordinance recommended by the Planning Commission on June 5, 2013, to change the zoning of property as indicated on the District Map, from "E" Multiple-Family Dwelling District and "J" Industrial District to the "H" Area Commercial District in City Blocks 3890 (4501, 4529, 4533, 4537, 4539 & 4541 Parkview Place) & 4781.05 (  4545 & 4565 Children's Place and 4528, 4530-56 & 4576 Parkview Place), so as to include the described parcels of land in City Blocks 3890 and 4781.05; and containing an emergency clause.
